nodes.text: Fungus (pl. fungi) was an organism found on countless worlds across the galaxy. These included yeasts, molds, and mushrooms.[source?] While some fungi were poisonous, such as the blood-eating fungus, many varieties were edible.
Fungus came in a variety of colors, including blue, blue-green, pink, lavender, peach, violet, yellow, and white. Some types of fungi were also luminescent. Fungi from Bakura were rainbow-colored.
Fungi on the Yuuzhan Vong world of Zonama Sekot were capable of movement on boras in order to search sunlight.
